channel.title: Help with choosing a Server
channel.description:
hey im new to the whole private server thing and i need a good source to use.
im looking for a source that can run on a 512MB RAM computer and has commands for admins and has skillcapes and silab items and good pking.
Umm if anybody can help me out Thanks
and ill give rep which ever way u can on here.
so please help me :) :) :)

item.title: Help with choosing a Server
item.dc:creator: @outrageouscape outrageouscape
item.description:
@outrageouscape wrote:

[quote=“Brenscapeowner, post:4, topic:220339”]well there are a few that ive used,I would recommend d d s p 3 c v3 or v2.5 but those are laggy for the owner

so, if u dont want to find yourself on a painfully lagged up computer try allstarscape v1 or funscap3…[/quote]

i am running a source i coded by my self that has no lag for anyone and i have 512mb ram…

Read full topic

item.description:

well there are a few that ive used,I would recommend d d s p 3 c v3 or v2.5 but those are laggy for the owner

item.title: Help with choosing a Server
item.dc:creator: @itans_plax itans plax
item.description:
@itans_plax wrote:

[quote=“purez4life, post:2, topic:220339”]For your information, 512mb isn’t very good… People that play your server will complain about lag. And I don’t think anyone here will answer 'cause they’re busy with their own servers or just lazy lol.
-purez4life[/quote]I dont think ur helping him purez, and btw thank for trying to help me but u r right in a way. 512mb isnt very good so goon any server and u’d probably be fine.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with choosing a Server

item.description:

For your information, 512mb isn’t very good… People that play your server will complain about lag. And I don’t think anyone here will answer 'cause they’re busy with their own servers or just lazy lol.
